creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two embroidered patterns repeated diagonally--one is a pagoda with two figures, 5-3/4" x 5-1/2"--other is flora and fauna, 3-1/2" x 3-3/4"; "clean" colors of lavender, pink, gold, teal, maroon; lined in black
title: Baby Carrier
